name: Easy Flight Powered Parachutes
about: Easy Flight Powered Parachutes is a professional sport aviation center specializing in powered parachute flight, based at the Greenville Municipal Airport. We offer a comprehensive 15-day training program designed to help students earn their FAA Sport Pilot certificate. Our modular training includes ground school, covering topics such as navigation, weather, and regulations, as well as extensive flying time focusing on takeoffs, landings, pattern work, radio operations, and emergency procedures. With a one-to-one student/teacher ratio, our dedicated instructors ensure quality and efficient training. We provide all necessary materials, equipment, fuel, and lodging, ensuring students can focus solely on completing their certification without additional costs. Our commitment is to make every student a proficient and safe aviator. At Easy Flight, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your flying dreams efficiently and effectively.
services:

Ground School
